thread.title: Real Madrid star Karim Benzema looks a little too pleased with himself after scoring long-range stunner in training
thread.title_full: Real Madrid star Karim Benzema looks a little too pleased with himself after scoring long-range stunner in training

author: Jake Polden
title: Real Madrid star Karim Benzema looks a little too pleased with himself after scoring long-range stunner in training
text:
Get Real Madrid CF updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Real Madrid's incredible 40-match unbeaten run came to an end at the hands of Sevilla on Sunday. 
That's enough to put a dent in anyone's confidence, but not Karim Benzema's it seems. 
Not only did the Frenchman score a stunning long-range goal from the edge of the area in training, but he also celebrated it in style. 
See for yourself in the above video as the entire squad take part in some shooting drills as a way to cheer themselves up on the back of their 2-1 defeat. Watch this, Zinedine (Photo: Real Madrid/Getty Images) 
Benzema sprints onto the ball and with his right foot strikes it into the bottom corner of the net. 
He then runs off and points to someone or something, it's very hard to tell considering there is no crowd looking, before putting his arms out to the side. 
You know, just like Vincenzo Montella used to do... in actual games. That's what I do, baby (Photo: YouTube/Real Madrid C.F.) The little aeroplane (Photo: YouTube/Real Madrid C.F.) 
Still, we're sure Zinedine Zidane will be pleased his players are upbeat following their first defeat in a staggering 40 games. 
Onwards and upwards. Will Real Madrid win La Liga this season? 1000+ VOTES SO FAR
